wikitext.*:
'''''ereb''''' (pl. ''erib'') means ''lonely'' or ''isolated'' in [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entry ''[[er]]''</ref>

==Etymology==
From the [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[ER]] plus the adjectival ending [[-eb]].

It's also possible that it derives from [[Old Sindarin]] full word *''eripa'' and this from [[Primitive Elvish]] *''erikwâ''

==Examples==
*''[[Amon Ereb|Amon '''Ereb''']]'' = "Lonely Hill"
*''[[Bar-erib|Bar '''Erib''']]'' = "Home of the Lonely Ones"
*''[[Erebor|'''Ereb'''or]]'' = "Lonely Mountain"
